about_the_game:
GameLib is an application that brings together several 3D multiplayer mini-games, such as Werewolves Online, Ludo, and Connect 4 (4 in a row).

GameLib features an in-app voice chat function, so you can communicate with other players during the game, whether you're trying to discover a suspect, set the course of a game, or simply have a good time together.

You can also add players as friends and communicate with them via an in-app messaging system to keep in touch.

Werewolves Online:

Up to 15 players can join this role-playing, strategy, and bluffing game. At the start of each game, you're given a card representing a unique role: villager, werewolf, or solo role. No matter which clan you belong to, the objective is the same for everyone: to win the game!

Without revealing your role, by using strategy and the powers you've been given, you'll have to do everything you can for yourself or your team/pack to succeed and win. If you don't, you'll be devoured by werewolves, eliminated by the village using a voting system at sunrise, or face some other fate...

Ludo:

Play Ludo, a classic and friendly board game for 2 to 4 players. Roll the dice, move your pawns around the board, and be the first to reach the center of the board to win! But be careful, strategy is key: block your opponents and plan your movements to gain the advantage. Tactics and luck combine for fun and competitive games on GameLib!

Connect 4:

Immerse yourself in the strategic universe of Connect 4, a classic and timeless game. Compete against your friends or other online players. Line up 4 tokens of your color horizontally, vertically, or diagonally before your opponent. But be careful, every move counts, and a single mistake can cost you victory! Simplicity, reflection, and competition: take up the challenge and become the master of Connect 4 on GameLib!

You'll have the choice of playing with close friends or joining public games with unknown players to add a little suspense to your games!

Come and discover our application by downloading it, and show off your talents to other players!
